sentences.en: He also had his licence endorsed with eight penalty points.
sentences.cn: 他的驾驶执照也被扣了8分。

sentences.en: He miskicked the ball twice at the edge of the penalty box.
sentences.cn: 在禁区边缘他两次将球踢飞。

sentences.en: he ordered enterprises to fulfil contracts under penalty of strict fines.
sentences.cn: 他以严厉罚款相威胁，命令企业履行合同。

sentences.en: He scored four of the goals but missed a penalty.
sentences.cn: 他4次射门得分，却罚失了1粒点球。

sentences.en: If convicted for murder, both youngsters could face the death penalty.
sentences.cn: 如果谋杀罪名成立，这两个年轻人都可能会被判处死刑。

sentences.en: If he is convicted, he could receive the death penalty (= be killed as a punishment ) .
sentences.cn: 一旦定罪，他可能会被判处死刑。

sentences.en: It was a crime of espionage and carried the death penalty.
It was more nerve-wracking than taking a World Cup penalty.
sentences.cn: 这比在世界杯上罚点球还扣人心弦。

sentences.en: It's now unlikely that future parliaments will bring back the death penalty.
sentences.cn: 现在看来，将来议会不太可能恢复死刑。

sentences.en: Jonathan Davies scored a penalty goal.
sentences.cn: 乔纳森·戴维斯点球得分。

sentences.en: Luton conceded a free kick on the edge of the penalty area.
sentences.cn: 卢顿未能在罚球区的边缘截住对方的任意球。
禁止乱扔垃圾。 违者罚款500美元。

sentences.en: Referee Michael Reed had no hesitation in awarding a penalty.
sentences.cn: 裁判迈克尔·里德毫不犹豫地判了点球。

sentences.en: The following year Parliament voted to abolish the death penalty for murder.
sentences.cn: 议会于翌年表决对谋杀罪废除死刑。

sentences.en: The home side drew first blood with a penalty from Murray Strang.
sentences.cn: 主场球队依靠默里·斯特朗的罚球而旗开得胜。

sentences.en: The referee blew his whistle for a penalty.
The referee ignored voices baying for a penalty.
sentences.cn: 裁判对要求判罚点球的叫喊声不予理睬。

sentences.en: Why should I pay the penalty for somebody else's mistake?
Withdrawing the money early will result in a 10% penalty.
sentences.cn: 提前支取这笔钱将被处以10%的罚金。

words.tran_cn: 惩罚，处罚；使…处于严重不利地位

phrases.tran_cn: （冰球、曲棍球）被罚下场的队员座席

trans.tran_cn: 惩罚，刑罚，害处，足球点球
trans.tran_en: a punishment for breaking a law, rule, or legal agreement
